Select itemid, itemname, cateid, catetype, itemdes, inputstr, stopflag, salesprice, wholesaleprice, itemspec, unitname, unittypeid, createdate, updatedate, createuser, updateuser From DictItem
itemid=#ItemID#

Select DictItem.itemid, DictItem.itemname, cateid, catetype, itemdes, inputstr, stopflag, stopflagin, stopflagout, salesprice, wholesaleprice, itemspec, unitname, unittypeid, DictItem.createdate, updatedate, DictItem.createuser, updateuser, outprice, batchcode, enterpriseid From DictItem inner join PackageItem on DictItem.itemid= PackageItem.itemid inner join PackageType on PackageType.PackAgeTypeId=PackageItem.PackTypeId where PackageType.PackAgeTypeId = #PackTypeId#

select * from ( Select itemid, itemname, cateid, catetype, itemdes, inputstr, stopflag, salesprice, itemspec, unitname, unittypeid, createdate, updatedate, createuser, updateuser, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by $OrderBy$ ) rowNumber From DictItem where stopFlag=0 $Condition$ ) aa where rowNumber BETWEEN #Next# and #Prev#

Select itemid, itemname, s1.cateid, s1.catetype, itemdes, s1.inputstr, stopflag, salesprice, itemspec, unitname, unittypeid, s1.createdate, s1.updatedate, s1.createuser, s1.updateuser From DictItem s1 inner join DictItem_Cate s2 on s1.CateID = s2.CateID where stopFlag=0 $Condition$
